amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to increase funding for the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $1,000,000, with the increase intended to support the development and deployment of high-efficiency linear generator power plant technology which, for purposes of stationary electric power production, is equivalent to fuel cell power plant technology; and to decrease funding for Departmental Administration by $1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Ms. Eshoo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
